dct_description_sm: dressée et gravée par P. Tardieu ; J. Vermot édit.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Lieues communes de France", "Milles romains", and "Milles judaiques".
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
"Mapa de la Tierra Santa y Plano de Jerusalen. Carta della Terra Santa e plano di Gerusalemme" -- at top of map.
Inset map: Plan de Jerusalem d'après Catherwood.
